A4.text: In October 1996, LVMH moved Galliano to Christian Dior, replacing Italian designer Gianfranco Ferr√©.

A5.text: In July 1995, he was appointed as the head designer of Givenchy by Bernard Arnault, owner of luxury goods conglomerate LVMH.
